mapper.select:
select gx.sxh, gx.gxid, gx.xmid, gx.yjdid, xm.bdcdyh, case when xm.qllx=95 or xm.qllx=37 then decode(xm.bdcqzh,'',xm.ycqzh,xm.bdcqzh) else xm.bdcqzh end bdcqzh, xm.slbh, xm.zl,xm.qlr from bdc_xm_yjd_gx gx inner join bdc_xm xm on xm.xmid = gx.xmid where 1=1
and gx.yjdid = #{yjdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND instr(xm.slbh,#{yjdceSlbh})>0
AND instr(xm.zl,#{zl})>0
AND instr(xm.qlr,#{qlr})>0
order by gx.sxh, xm.slbh

SELECT DISTINCT t.yjdid AS yjdid, t.yjdbh, t.yjsj, t.yjr, t.jsr FROM bdc_yjd t LEFT JOIN bdc_xm_yjd_gx t1 ON t.yjdid = t1.yjdid
AND t1.xmid = #{xmid}

SELECT MAX(X.GZLSLID) AS GZLSLID, MAX(X.SLBH) AS SLBH, MAX(X.GZLDYMC) AS GZLDYMC, MAX(X.AJZT) AS AJZT, MAX(X.QSZT) AS QSZT, MAX(X.DJSJ) AS DJSJ, MAX(X.DJLX) AS DJLX,
CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT X.QLR) = 1 THEN MAX(X.QLR) WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT X.QLR) > 1 THEN MAX(X.QLR) || '等' END AS QLR,
CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT X.BDCDYH) = 1 THEN MAX(X.BDCDYH) WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT X.BDCDYH) > 1 THEN MAX(X.BDCDYH) || '等' END AS BDCDYH,
CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT X.ZL) = 1 THEN MAX(X.ZL) WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT X.ZL) > 1 THEN MAX(X.ZL) || '等' END AS ZL,
CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT X.BDCQZH) = 1 THEN MAX(X.BDCQZH) WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT X.BDCQZH) > 1 THEN MAX(X.BDCQZH) || '等' END AS BDCQZH FROM BDC_XM X
AND (( X.AJZT = 2 AND X.QSZT != 0 ) OR ( X.AJZT = 1 AND X.QSZT = 1 ))
AND X.AJZT = 2
AND ( (X.AJZT = 2) OR ( X.AJZT = 2 AND X.QSZT != 0 ) OR ( X.AJZT = 1 AND X.QSZT = 1 ))
AND X.AJZT = 2 AND X.QSZT != 0
AND X.SLBH = #{slbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND X.BDCDYH like '%' || #{bdcdyh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND X.ZL like '%' || #{zl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND X.XMID IN ( SELECT XMID FROM BDC_XM_ZS_GX WHERE ZSID IN ( SELECT ZSID FROM BDC_ZS Z WHERE z.bdcqzh like '%' || #{bdcqzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' ) )
AND X.XMID IN ( SELECT XMID FROM BDC_XM_YJD_GX WHERE YJDID = #{yjdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
AND x.slbh IN
#{slbh}
GROUP BY GZLSLID ORDER BY MAX(X.DJSJ)
SELECT YJDID, YJDBH FROM BDC_YJD WHERE YJDID IN ( SELECT YJDID FROM BDC_XM_YJD_GX WHERE XMID IN ( SELECT XMID FROM BDC_XM WHERE SLBH = #{slbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )

SELECT DISTINCT XMID FROM BDC_XM WHERE SLBH IN
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT xmid, slbh FROM BDC_XM WHERE SLBH IN
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT YXM.SLBH FROM BDC_XM YXM JOIN BDC_XM_LSGX L ON YXM.XMID = L.YXMID JOIN BDC_XM X ON X.XMID = L.XMID
X.SLBH = #{slbh, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND YXM.AJZT = 2 AND YXM.QLLX NOT IN (95, 98,37)

SELECT DISTINCT NXM.SLBH FROM BDC_XM NXM JOIN BDC_XM_LSGX L ON NXM.XMID = L.XMID JOIN BDC_XM X ON X.XMID = L.YXMID
X.SLBH = #{slbh, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND NXM.AJZT = 2 AND NXM.QLLX NOT IN (95, 98,37)
mapper.update:
update BDC_YJD_TASK_GX g set g.dyzt=1 where g.taskid in
#{item}
